sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: Ethical approval was granted by Govan Mbeki Research & Development Centre (GMRDC), University of Fort Hare (UFH) and consent was approved by Cala Traditional Health Practitioners. Ethical clearance for the research was granted by the Ministry of Health and Social Services (Namibia) and the Department of Health, Eastern Cape (South Africa). Informed written consent was obtained from each study participant prior to sample collection which was carried out by qualified midwives.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
